alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:25PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Park County through 500 PM MDT... At 423 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Meeteetse, moving slowly north at 10 mph. Another storm was located over Y U Bench Road, also moving slowly north. HAZARD...Heavy rain of one-quarter to one-half inch and pea sized hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility and ponding of water on the roadways. Locations impacted include... Meeteetse and Meeteetse Rim. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Seek shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin
